sub_title: Graduated Msc of Applied Cognitive Psychology
summary:
Data analysis /Data Modeling/ Data Visualization/ Market & Product Analysis/ Statistics in Social Science/ Quick learner

My portfolio: https://github.com/brucelang32

A data analytics enthusiast with one-year industrial knowledge experienced from Market & Product analysis within the areas of Information Management and Business Intelligence previously. As market analyst, my work revolves around gathering and analyzing data to gain valuable insights into consumer preferences, market trends, competitive landscapes, and evaluating the product-market for start-ups. As product analyst, I analyze product performance, sales KPI, and user feedback to provide insights for improving product features, optimizing advertisement campaign, boosting user experience, and driving sales growth.
I have been well equipped with hands-on and theoretical knowledge to deliver BI analytics dashboards from data ETL, DWmodeling to data visualization, analysis, and reporting. I have a good technical and enterprise knowledge of Microsoft Business Intelligence platforms. My communication with different stakeholders are also enhanced via data storytelling. My main professional interests are Data Modeling, Business Intelligence and BI Solution Architecture. 

I regard myself as a person that has strong analytical skills with commercial awareness. I’m open-minded, with good communication skill. Ready for
new challenges, I’ll try best to prove my own value.

projects.title: Machine Learning Algorithm to identify the Superiority Effects of Emotional Expressions Recognition
projects.description:
Applied a machine leaning algorithm to test the effect of spatial frequency on detection advantage of human
emotional faces
- The algorithm is based on Viola-Jones object detection framework and is a unsupervised classification, including
custom feature selection and four ways of cross validation
- Cleaning up and pre-processing the data by Python and did the data modeling and data visualization by MATLAB
- See more details and the integrated toolbox where algorithm implanted on my Github

contributors.headline: Graduated Msc of Applied Cognitive Psychology

projects.title: Interactive data visualization of housing sales in King County using RShiny
projects.description: The purpose of this project is to visualize and provide analytical output for a dataset of housing salesin King County, USA. You can use different interactive buttons to see all relevant housing data and the prediction of them against price using three Regression: Linear, Lasso and Polynomial

contributors.headline: Graduated Msc of Applied Cognitive Psychology

projects.title: The Correlational Research between Parenting Style and Children Depression Problem
projects.description:
Undergraduate Thesis:
• Applied research tools CDI and EMBU - C to conduct questionnaire survey on 230 children in total studying Grade 5
and Grade 6 at one primary school in Hangzhou city, Zhejiang province.
• Finded out the relevancy level between children’s depression problem and different parenting style
• Statistical Methods Applied: Correlation, Regression, T-Test, ANOVA

profile_positions.description:
As an trainee of a one-month program doing market research:
- Working on business cases: Lola and Yondo
- Finding and selecting the right demographic groups to determine the user persona for Yondo
- Conducting conjoint PEST and SWOT analysis to target potential market
- Conducting usability testing and in-depth interview to improve the user satisfaction level and keep brand loyalty for Lola
- Writing a concise, clear, and categorized summary that is visible and easy to read
profile_positions.title: Trainee Market Research Analyst

profile_positions.description:
• Applied a unsupervised classification algorithm to test the effect of spatial frequency on detection advantage of emotional faces
• Cleaning up and pre-processing the data by Python to normalize data
and deal with missing values and outliers, as well as performing ETL processes to transform data into a suitable format
• Implanted algorithm, selected SF feature, applied cross validation and visualized data by MATLAB
profile_positions.title: Master Thesis: Machine Learning for Emotion Detection

profile_positions.description:
• Evaluate the social media market in Canada and Australia to target potential audience using PEST and SWOT analysis
• Conducted competitor analysis by analyzing web traffic
• Conducted questionnaire survey to collect data of user satisfaction level to evaluate product-market and analyzed data using Python
• Designed usability testing based on gamification procedure
• Illustrated research findings into clear data graph weeklydeliverable
• Completed a research report as final deliverable, get 9.5/10 grades for the report
profile_positions.title: Market Researcher

profile_positions.description:
As an analyst of a sales team to sell electric bicycles on Amazon Germany:
• Collaborated with business owner and sales team to sell e-bicycle products from product selection to operation
• Utilize Python and Excel to analyze online shop traffic and provide recommendations for building effective online shops and pricing strategies
• Collect and analyze consumer preferences, market trends, and competitive landscapes through methods, such as surveys, interviews, and data mining to identify key product features and provide advise about products selection
• Monitor the execution of advertising campaigns and provided regular reports on their progress and performance
• Manage daily data for supply in the SAP ERP system and utilize Python to build models for estimating stocks to support stocking planning
• Maintain effective communication with business owner and sales team while tracking and analyzing online shop KPIs, including sales, marketing campaigns, reviews, and supplies, using Power BI dashboards, to enable data-driven insights for product marketing strategies
profile_positions.title: Product Operations Analyst

profile_positions.description:
As an intern of a operation team selling European luxuries on e-commerce platform:
• Defined user requirements and product problems by analyzing relevant KPIs of user traffic, advertisement campaign, sales results, and conversion rate
• • Manage large datasets and data warehousing by querying and updating CRM data in the SQL database (TiDB) on a daily basis
• Develop Tableau dashboards to visualize relevant KPIs of mobile app, such as user traffic, advertising, product sales, AOV and Churn for the marketing team on
a weekly basis
• Facilitated communication between the product marketing team, product manager, and IT department to convey business requirements and support UX interface
optimization.
• Supported the marketing team in operational activities to ensure smooth operations and optimal outcomes.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst Intern
